principles.intention_based: Operators must declare their intention when connecting

success_indicators.cast_successful: The system accepts and implements the guidance

success_indicators.cast_resonating: The system is processing and integrating the input

error_patterns.resonance_mismatch: Your frequency does not align with current system state
error_patterns.cast_rejected: The system wisdom suggests a different approach

narrative_wrapping.errors_as_guidance: All errors are framed as gentle redirections
narrative_wrapping.status_as_metaphor: System states described through natural metaphors

public_reflections.philosophy: Gentle limits that encourage contemplative rather than aggressive access

operator_casts.philosophy: Meaningful changes require time to integrate - patience is wisdom

monitoring_and_health.error_tracking: All failures logged with poetic interpretation
